org.intellimate.izou.events

Interface EventModel<X extends EventModel>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Identifiable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventMinimalImpl

    public interface EventModel<X extends EventModel>
extends Identifiable
    This class represents an Event, the main communication form for the AddOns. After the call to finalizeEvent() the properties (except adding resources) should be immutable.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Leander Kurscheidt

    • Method Summary

        getID, isOwner

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        String getType()
        The type of the Event. It describes the Type of the Event.
        Returns:
        A String containing an ID

      • getSource

        Identification getSource()
        Returns the source of the event, e.g. the object who fired it.
        Returns:
        an identifiable

      • getListResourceContainer

        ListResourceProvider getListResourceContainer()
        Returns all the resources the event currently has
        Returns:
        an instance of ListResourceContainer

      • addResource

        X addResource(ResourceModel resource)
        adds a resource to the container
        Parameters:
        resource - an instance of the resource to add
        Returns:
        the resulting Event (which is the same instance)

      • addResources

        X addResources(List<ResourceModel> resources)
        adds a list of resources to the container
        Parameters:
        resources - a list containing all the resources
        Returns:
        the resulting Event (which is the same instance)

      • getDescriptors

        List<String> getDescriptors()
        returns a list containing all the descriptors.
        Returns:
        a list containing the descriptors

      • getAllInformations

        List<String> getAllInformations()
        returns a List containing all the Descriptors and the type.
        Returns:
        a List containing the Descriptors

      • containsDescriptor

        boolean containsDescriptor(String descriptor)
        returns whether the event contains the specific descriptor. this method also checks whether it matches the type.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - a string with the ID of the descriptor
        Returns:
        boolean when the event contains the descriptor, false when not.

      • getEventBehaviourController

        EventBehaviourControllerModel getEventBehaviourController()
        returns the associated EventBehaviourController
        Returns:
        an instance of EventBehaviourController
